name: Time Gap Puppies
description:
A bullet hell shooting game that you can go back in time and use time lapse to always be successful, go back in time whenever you want and show all your skills.

  • Go back in time when you want.
  • Fast action shooter.
  • Six characters to play.
  • Five worlds with 4 levels each.
  • Random generator levels.
  • Crazy weapons power ups.
  • Unlock the Miner.
Will you be able to unlock The Miner ?
